name: hydro-cannon
effect: Inflicts regular damage. User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
short_effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The foe is hit with a watery blast. The user must rest on the next turn, however.
flavor_text.platinum: The foe is hit with a watery blast. The user must rest on the next turn, however.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The foe is hit with a watery blast. The user must rest on the next turn, however.
